name: ReactPod
description:
Added focus app inside
Added playlist functionality
Added clear library option
Added customization like colour of the ipod 
Added fun games
Added the playing screen shows actual song meta data on my iPhone
Added the ability to show the number of songs playing tab in now playing screen
Added the ability to add multiple folders of songs
Added on device storage
Added search, on-the-go playlist option, and rating music option
Added shuffle and loop options
Added cover flow
A web-based music player that emulates the classic iPod interface, allowing you to play local music files from your device.
